meaning_str.bing:
n. 移动；活动；迁移；乐章
网络. 运动；动作；机芯

运动；移动；活动；转移；行踪；乐章；改进；发展；量的变化；逐步的转变；（飞机）抵达；起飞

1.en: A city is a symphony, to hear it is to follow every note and beat of every movement.
1.cn: 城市是一首交响乐，聆听她，就像在用心感受乐章的每一个音符与节拍。

2.en: I can only pay tribute to his tremendous achievements and legacy, and praise his genuine devotion to the Olympic Movement and its values.
2.cn: 我仅能对他的卓越成就和遗产说声感谢，并对他给予奥林匹克运动带来的真诚贡献表示赞扬。

3.en: When it is over, he said, New York's Occupy movement will return to working to build sustainable communities around the city.
3.cn: 当它结束的时候，他说道，纽约的占领运动将回到为这个城市努力构建可持续社区的正轨中去。

0.en: I'm hoping to extract an algorithm to define their movement.
0.cn: 我希望能创造一条能够描述他们运动的运算法则。

1.en: We code the data into the movement of the second hand.
1.cn: 我们可以把数据转化成秒针的运动。

2.en: No, what if it was a precursor movement along the leading edge of the plate boundary fault from Los Angeles all the way up to San Francisco?
2.cn: 不，如果这是板块运动的开始，而板块的边界从洛杉矶一直延续到旧金山。

3.en: With pressure from the growing environmental movement, president Richard Nixon signed the clean air act of 1970 into law.
3.cn: 随着环境保护运动的展开，迫于压力，理查得·尼克松总统在1970年签署了《清洁空气法案》。

4.en: Forced into it by a society no longer willing to support them. That may soon be changing, due to a growing movement to bring the Supers back.
4.cn: 社会不再支持他们他们被迫转入地下。这一切也许即将改变一项不断壮大的运动将让超人重回公众视野。

5.en: And with movement interesting things begin to happen.
5.cn: 可以行动后就会发生有趣的事。

6.en: Oh yeah, Dana Keystone. She was in my Movement class.
6.cn: 知道，黛娜基史东，我们一起修动作课。

7.en: My mother calls me at work to see if I had a healthy bowel movement.
7.cn: 我妈妈会在上班时打给我问我排便是否正常.

8.en: What's a Movement class? It's Chandler's way of pretending he didn't take mime.
8.cn: 什么是动作课？钱德在假装他没修过哑剧。

9.en: You're eating a zarg-nut. But my movement was so slow that it's imperceptible. No.
9.cn: 你在吃花生糖呢。但是我的动作如此缓慢令人难以察觉。不是。

10.en: Peach, any movement? He's had four cups of coffee. It's gotta be soon. Keep on him.
10.cn: 桃桃，有什么情况？他已经喝了至少四杯咖啡了，我看快了。继续监视住他。

11.en: We went to Beijing to find out how they cope with the biggest movement of people on Earth.
11.cn: 我们来到北京，去探究他们如何应对这场地球上最大的人员转移。

12.en: Unacceptable. The delay would result in tomorrow morning's bowel movement occurring at work.
12.cn: 不予通过，吃饭太晚会造成明天早晨的大肠蠕动出现在工作时间。

13.en: Every movement I made was entirely random, every new personality just on the roll of a dice!
13.cn: 我的每一步都是完全随机的，每个新身份都全凭掷骰子决定！

14.en: He threw everything into physio the first year, and all he got from it was slight movement in his thumb and finger.
14.cn: 第一年他非常努力做物理治疗，结果只能稍微动一动大拇指和食指。

15.en: Today we're gonna be working on managing our anger through movement. The first pose is the dancer pose. Great form, Terence.
15.cn: 今天我们一起学习一个方法来管理我们的愤怒，用肢体活动，第一个动作，叫做舞者式，做得很好，大红。

16.en: We can't stop our movement down this river, and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
16.cn: 我们身在时间之河上停不下来，也无法避免问题。我们只能选择最好的处理办法。

17.en: But all my efforts our dinner schedule, my pajama rotation, my bowel movement spreadsheet it's clear now, I've been wasting my time.
17.cn: 而我所有的努力，我的晚餐安排，我的睡衣轮换制，我的排便情况试算表，现在我算明白了，我一直在浪费时间。

18.en: Yeah. Yeah, but the earthquake that they felt was from movement along the fault line in the central valley. Their end of the fault line has not moved yet.
18.cn: 是的，不过他们感受到的地震来自中央谷断层线的活动。而尾部的断层线还没有开始移动。

19.en: The most revered of the mythical animals, its movement in the performance must demonstrate its power and dignity, and the longer it is, the more luck it will bring the community.
19.cn: 它是最神秘和令人敬畏的动物，表演中的每个动作都是在彰显自己的权力和尊严，舞龙越长，越是能给社区带来好运。
